post.author: 부기흡
post.content:
If you have at least 2 years of professional experiences, send me your resume at khboo@hotmail.com.

If you applied for a position at IBM before (either directly or through a job agency), you do not need to apply for this.

=========================
The Tivoli On Demand team at the Toronto Lab is currently expanding rapidly and is looking to hire a number of experienced technical staff members to join their team.  We currently have many Professional positions being advertised at the IBM Canada Web site.  Tivoli is currently looking for Java Developers, Software Testers, Information Developers and System Integrators.

The Lab's Data Management  team is also expanding and has begun to advertise new positions for experienced professionals.  As usual, there are many other experienced professional positions available.
post.title: Opportunities at the IBM Toronto Lab
